sentences.en: At the end of a day's teaching, her nerves were absolutely shattered.
sentences.cn: 教了一天课, 她精疲力竭.

sentences.en: He dropped the vase and it shattered into pieces on the floor.
sentences.cn: 他失手把花瓶掉到地板上摔碎了。

sentences.en: He had been shattered by his son's death.
sentences.cn: 儿子的死让他大受打击。

sentences.en: He was shattered and bewildered by this trenchant criticism.
sentences.cn: 他因这番尖锐的批评而万念俱灰，茫然不知所措。

sentences.en: His life has been cruelly shattered by an event not of his own making.
sentences.cn: 他的一生被一件原本与他无关的事残酷地毁了。

sentences.en: I wasn’t just disappointed, I was absolutely shattered.
sentences.cn: 我不仅是失望，我是彻底心灰意冷了。

sentences.en: It is no good being shattered by failure.
sentences.cn: 在失败面前,不能张皇失措.

sentences.en: Music is an appeasement to shattered nerves.
sentences.cn: 音乐可抚慰受重创的神经.
一颗子弹打穿了他的头颅。

sentences.en: Teresa was devastated, her dreams shattered.
sentences.cn: 特雷莎伤心欲绝——她的梦想彻底破灭了。

sentences.en: The bottle was shattered to pieces.
The car shattered into a thousand burning pieces in a 200mph crash.
sentences.cn: 汽车在时速为200英里时发生撞车，炸成了数以千计燃烧的碎片。

sentences.en: The experience left her feeling absolutely shattered.
sentences.cn: 她在这次经历之后，感到彻底垮了。

sentences.en: The glass was shattered to pieces.
The heavy rain shattered on the roof.
sentences.cn: 大雨哗啦啦地落在屋顶上.

sentences.en: This metaphor of shattered gravestones ran the length of the camp, splitting it in two, but did not extend eastward to the villa occupied by Commandant Goeth himself.
sentences.cn: 这条被喻为破碎墓碑铺成的大道穿过了整个营地，将其一分为二，但这条路并没有向东延伸到高斯司令自己住的别墅。

sentences.en: We had one person who walked out of an interview straight into a glass door. The glass shattered.
sentences.cn: 我们面试过的一个人面试完之后径直走出去撞到了玻璃门上。玻璃都碎了。

words.tran_cn: 打碎；削弱；使心烦意乱（shatter的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 打碎，破坏，损坏，使心烦意乱(shatter的过去分词)
